pr_title: Apply copy artifact to only master and *-reliability

timeline.message: Apply copy artifact to only master and *-reliability

timeline.bodyText:
Only comment I'd have is - lets create a new docker image and put copy_artifact_s3.py there.
We'll be able to use it in internal builds as well as here. also with some good tags we can auto update the script - if needed - in the future.
timeline.author: pawelchcki
timeline.diffHunk:
@@ -262,6 +262,18 @@ jobs:
   publish_tag:
     <<: *publish
 
+  copy_artifact_s3:
+    docker:
+      - image: circleci/python:3.6.4

timeline.message: Apply copy artifact to only master and *-reliability
